# async_agent

The `AsyncAgent` module for creating and managing asynchronous LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_agent/index" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_agent/index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/async_agent/index" symbolName="BaseAgent" /> BaseAgent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Class" path="agents/async_agent/index" symbolName="AsyncAgent" /> AsyncAgent

Asynchronous agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.
